content: In the HL7 standard template, is the TOC Sidebar too narrow? I'm attaching a screenshot. It is even a good idea to split the screen vertically? pasted image

The TOC is normally limited to only 2 levels of content, so that helps some. The presumption is also that labels will be relatively short. Splitting the screen is a possibility, but not a simple change to make
I prefer the wiki layout ( toc at top ) which allows it to be a little wider (30%) is what I set it at
